languages.name: C/C++
languages.description: C/C++ is a programming language used for system and application development. I learned it during my second year of undergraduate studies, self-taught.

languages.name: Python
languages.description: Python is a versatile and easy-to-learn programming language. I learned it during my second year of undergraduate studies, self-taught, and refined it in my master's program (Courses and Internships).

languages.name: Java
languages.description: Java is an object-oriented programming language used for developing web and mobile applications. I learned it in my second year of master's program, using Maven.

languages.name: JavaScript
languages.description: JavaScript is the programming language of the web, allowing interactivity on websites. I learned it self-taught in an associative context, as well as during an internship.

languages.name: TypeScript
languages.description: TypeScript is a superset of JavaScript that adds static typing. I learned it following JavaScript, in an associative context.

languages.name: SQL
languages.description: SQL is a query language used to manage and query databases. I learned it during my master's program.

languages.name: Bash
languages.description: Bash is a scripting language used in UNIX/Linux systems to automate tasks. I learned it self-taught during my second year of undergraduate studies, and refined it in my master's program (Courses and Internships).

languages.name: Docker
languages.description: Docker is a platform that automates the deployment of applications in lightweight and portable containers. I learned it self-taught, in an associative context.

languages.name: React
languages.description: React is a JavaScript library for building interactive and dynamic user interfaces. I learned it self-taught, in an associative context (Courses and Internship).

BiologicalProcess.name: Dosage
BiologicalProcess.description: Dosage is a technique used to measure the concentration of a substance. I learned it during my third year of undergraduate studies.

BiologicalProcess.name: Western-Blot
BiologicalProcess.description: Western Blot is a method used to detect specific proteins in a sample. I learned it during my third year of undergraduate studies.

BiologicalProcess.name: Cloning
BiologicalProcess.description: Cloning is a technique in molecular biology to create genetic copies of an organism. I learned it during my third year of undergraduate studies.
